TEI.2.document_title: Jonathan Taylor and Company to Taylor Wilkins and Company, 03-01-1810

barker_notes.barker_summary: Taylor, Wilkins & Co., in account with Jonathan Taylor & Co.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 170

div1.p: Taylor, Wilkins & Co., in account with Jonathan Taylor & Co.
Bot of Jona. Taylor and Co.
Amt. of Pipes and Ketles on hand $15, 350. 00 Invoice of Merchandize 2, 800. 00 ___________ $18, 150. 00
Recd. from Anthony Butler four thousand five hundred and thirty seven Dollars 50 Cents being in full for his One fourth part of above
Jona. Taylor and Co. By Cha Wilkins
